textBox.richText: IAC, WAZ (11/17/08): A Little Prop 8 Consolation

In the aftermath of the election of Barack Obama, many liberal activists are now confused and feel like they have lost their sense of purpose.  Fortunately for them, prop 8 passed, so they can still fight for their freedoms! I'll be lining up a whole set of Gay related songs to console their hearts, heal their wounds, and fight the man!  Direct Show Link Show Description/Playlist Bonus Track, I didn't think I should play this on air: Norm McDonald - The World's First Two Gay Guys New Adds: Team Genius - Team Genius Happy Listening, DJ Recalcitrant id/ Ben
